meanings.definition: A building in which a state legislature meets.
meanings.sent1: The statehouse is where the lawmakers gather to discuss new laws.
meanings.sent2: I visited the statehouse to watch a session of the state legislature.
meanings.sent3: The statehouse must be a busy place with all the politicians running around.
meanings.sent4: In the heart of the city, the statehouse stands tall like a guardian of democracy.
meanings.sent5: The statehouse echoed with the voices of the representatives debating passionately.

meanings.sent1: The statehouse oversees the affairs of the state with care.
meanings.sent2: Citizens look to the statehouse for leadership and direction.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the statehouse ever has pizza parties to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent4: The decisions made in the statehouse shape the future of our state.
meanings.sent5: The statehouse symbolizes the power and responsibility of state governance.
